channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Formula 1 Driver Charles Leclerc Is Engaged to Model Alexandra Saint Mleux After Romantic Rose Petal Proposal
item.description: Leclerc and Saint Mleux announced the happy news in a joint Instagram post on Nov. 2

item.title: Donald Trump Says ICE Raids 'Haven't Gone Far Enough' Despite Violence Against Immigrants and Bystanders

item.title: Dax Shepard Explains Why He Lets His and Kristen Bell’s Daughters 'Talk Back' to Them and Have ‘No Kind of Respect’

item.title: Kelly Clarkson Announces Rescheduled Las Vegas Residency Shows After Postponing for Family Tragedy: See the New Dates
